title: Tim Walz gives first remarks since losing to Trump and Vance
shortDescription: After the Republican ticket's decisive presidential victory Tuesday, Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz returned home to thank his supporters.

title: No proof Kamala Harris said she'd skip Trump inauguration | Fact check
shortDescription: There is no credible evidence of Harris saying that. She has said the current administration will assist in the transition to Trump's second term.

title: No, CBS didn't accuse Trump of cheating in 2024 election | Fact check
shortDescription: There is no evidence to support the claim on CBS News' website or social media accounts, and a spokesperson for the network said the claim is false.

title: Harris voters concerned for the future
shortDescription: Harris was supposed to be President Joe Biden's political heir. Was she thrust into the spotlight too soon?

title: Post distorts inactive Colorado law about electoral votes | Fact check
shortDescription: The law was not active in 2024. If it takes effect, it will commit states to award their electoral votes to the national popular vote winner.

title: Trump Cabinet picks: What to know after Susie Wiles named chief of staff
shortDescription: With Donald Trump headed back to the White House, he has a few months to build his next adminsitration. He has picked his chief of staff, who is next?

title: Elon Musk joins Trump's first call with Ukrainian president Zelenskyy
shortDescription: Media reports say Musk, the world's richest man and a key Trump election backer, just happened to be in the room when Trump talked to Zelenskyy.

title: What to expect from a GOP trifecta | The Excerpt
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump pledged to follow though with mass deportations, in an interview with NBC News. This and more stories on The Excerpt.

title: How did Trump sweep the swing states?
shortDescription: Journalists from the USA TODAY network shared how former President Donald Trump took the key swing states in the 2024 elections.

title: Judge stops action in Donald Trump election interference case
shortDescription: The judge's decision came as the Justice Department prepared to wind down charges in both federal cases against Trump after his election Tuesday.

title: Man charged in thwarted Iranian plot to kill Trump: DOJ
shortDescription: The charges allege an Iranian conspiracy to kill Donald Trump in revenge for the 2020 killing of Gen. Qasem Soleimani.

title: No, 2024 victory isn't Trump's third election win | Fact check
shortDescription: Contrary to Trump's claims, he did not win the 2020 election. His 2024 win marks the second time he's prevailed in presidential elections.

title: Two House Republicans block bill to expand Social Security benefits
shortDescription: Two members of the ultraconservative House Freedom Caucus blocked a bill that would have repealed previous measures limiting Social Security benefits.

title: Who is Trump’s new chief of staff, Susie Wiles?
shortDescription: She’s been described as a major reason for Donald Trump’s political comeback. Here's what you need to know about Susie Wiles.

title: Trump won handily. Pollster says one thing 'is very clear.'
shortDescription: Trump has outperformed polling predictions in the last three elections. Here are one pollster's takeaways from 2024 election results.

title: Trump picks Susie Wiles as his White House chief of staff
shortDescription: Republican President-elect Donald Trump named campaign chief Susie Wiles as his White House chief of staff.

title: Trump, Biden, Harris are talking about unity. Don't hold your breath.
shortDescription: While the GOP's victory was more decisive than expected, it didn't narrow fundamental differences that have riven the political landscape.

title: Trump justice: Who will Donald Trump pick for attorney general?
shortDescription: Trump, who says the Justice Department was politicized under Joe Biden, has a long list of loyal supporters who could take the job.

title: Putin hails 'courageous' Trump, says he's ready to talk about Ukraine
shortDescription: Russia's Vladimir Putin congratulated Donald Trump on his election win, saying he was "hounded from all sides."

title: Germany government collapse: Pressure mounts on Chancellor Scholz to trigger election
shortDescription: Germany's government coalition fell apart on Wednesday after Chancellor Olaf Scholz fired his finance minister.

title: 'Stop being mean': Democrats come for Moo Deng after Donald Trump win
shortDescription: Moo Deng, an internet famous pigmy hippo from Thailand, is facing being cancelled by some Democrats after over her involvement in the 2024 Presidential Election.

title: Who is Susie Wiles? What to know about Trump's new chief of staff
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump chose Susie Wiles Thursday to be his White House chief of staff. Here's what to know about the Florida political consultant.
